trends.title: Kinship Data Benchmark for Multi-hop Reasoning

trends.title: Beyond External Guidance: Unleashing the Semantic Richness Inside Diffusion Transformers for Improved Training

trends.title: Video Evidence to Reasoning Efficient Video Understanding via Explicit Evidence Grounding
trends.description: Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) face a fundamental dilemma in video reasoning: they are caught between the prohibitive computational costs of verbose reasoning and the hallucination risks of efficient, ungrounded approaches.
